A field expected to be unique already ha: Polje, ki bi moralo biti enolično, vsebuje že shranjeno vrednost
A file attachment is required to complet: Za dokončanje naznanitve je potrebno priložiti datoteko
A useful way to hide your key code is to: A useful way to hide your key code is to write it down like a credit card number, i.e. by also including an expiration date.
Allow Receivers to postpone expiration d: Dovoli prejemnikom, da preložijo datum izteka prijave
Allow access of public resources via Tor: Dovoli dostop do javno objavljenega prek Tor2web
Allow other websites to include the Glob: Dovoli drugim spletnim stranem, da vključujejo to platformo v iframe okvirjih
Allow the Receiver to postpone expiratio: Dovoli prejemniku, da preloži datum izteka prijave
An email notification will also always b: An email notification will also always be sent in case the user viewed the related info through the platform.
Anomalies are automatically analysed to: Anomalije so avtomatično analizirane, da bi sistem prepoznal zlorabo ali neobičajne intervale pogoste rabe.
Any donation made to support GlobaLeaks: Any donation made to support GlobaLeaks will be greatly appreciated; it will help us to further improve GlobaLeaks, making the world a better place
Are you sure that you want to delete the: Ali ste prepričani, da želite izbrisati kontekst?
Ali ste prepričani, da želite zbrisati to polje?
Ali ste prepričani, da želite izbrisati prejemnika?
Are you sure that you want to delete the step?
Ali ste prepričani, da želite zbrisati naznanitev globalno?
Are you sure that you want to postpone t: Are you sure that you want to postpone the tip expiration date?
Are you sure that you wish to continue?: Ali ste prepričani, da želite nadaljevati?
Before proceeding please choose a strong: Before proceeding please choose a strong password for your GlobaLeaks account.
By checking this box you agree to these: By checking this box you agree to these terms and conditions.
By confirming, you will postpone the Tip: By confirming, you will postpone the Tip expiration date to:
By enabling this option, the system will: Če boste omogočili to možnost, bo sistem shranjeval prejete datoteke nešifrirano na vašem vozlišču.
By enabling this option, you are allowin: V kolikor boste omogočili to možnost, boste dovolili drugim upravljalcem spletnih strani, da bodo prikazovali vsebino te strani na svoji. To predstavlja tveganje za številne zlorabe z namenom razkritja uporabnikov in prestrezanja.
Click to edit, drag to order: Kliknite za urejanje, povlecite za razvrščanje
Clicking the 'admin' link in the top-rig: Klik na povezavo "admin" v desnem zgornjem kotu vas bo preusmeril sem.
Contexts are the categories to be select: Contexts are the categories to be selected by whistleblowers, when they perform their submission. Make sure to make them pertinent to your project.
Copy and paste the PGP public key here: Copy and paste the PGP public key here
Describe your submission with a few word: Opišite svojo naznanitev z nekaj besedami
Disable receivers notifications emails: Onemogoči obveščanje obveščanje prejemnikov po e-pošti
Disable the security awareness panel que: Onemogoči vprašanja na pultu o varnostni ozaveščenosti
Enable insecure configuration without PG: Omogoči nezaščiteno delovanje brez PGP šifriranja
Enable insecure configuration without PGP encryption.
Enter a new GlobaLeaks server password: Enter a new GlobaLeaks server password
Enter the email address used to notify t: Enter the email address used to notify the receiver
Enter the name for your whistleblowing p: Enter the name for your whistleblowing project
Enter the name of the receiver: Enter the name of the receiver
Every event related to a new or updated: Every event related to a new or updated tip will trigger an email with a link to it.
Follow us on Twitter if you like to be p: Sledite nam na Twitterju, če želite biti pod drobnogledom NSA:
For each activity, the system will send: For each activity, the system will send you an apparently meaningless email. This should be used when you are on the move, even with an unsafe email or when you don't have your PGP key with you.
For technical support inquiries you can: Za tehnično podporo lahko zaprosite, tako da nam pišete na:
Prosimo počakajte, da prične ponovno delovati
Give a concise description of your proje: Give a concise description of your project
Give your whistleblowing project a good: Give your whistleblowing project a good name and description to invite whistleblowers to submit. Be sure to make the goals of your project clear.
Guidelines on how to start up Whistleblo: Smernice, kako začeti z žvižgaško pobudo
HTTPS does not protect the content of my: HTTPS ne zaščiti vsebine moje naznanitve niti ne zakrije moje identitete
HTTPS does protect both my identity and: HTTPS zakrije mojo identiteto in zaščiti vsebino moje naznanitve
HTTPS protects my identity, but not the: HTTPS zakrije mojo identiteto, toda ne zaščiti vsebine moje naznanitve
HTTPS protects the content of my leak bu: HTTPS zaščiti vsebino moje naznanitve, toda ne zakrije moje identitete
Have you already filed a submission? Ent: Ali ste že oddali naznanitev? Vnesite vašo šifro ključa.
Hint: How to hide your key code: Namig, kako skriti vašo šifro ključa
I've solved the math challenge, hide thi: Rešil sem matematično nalogo, skrij zdaj to reč!
If you want to tell us more about your p: Če bi nam želeli povedati več o svojem projektu ali potrebujete pomoč, nam lahko pišete na:
In order to deliver encrypted emails and: In order to deliver encrypted emails and files each receiver needs an associated PGP key. Cut and paste the key of the receiver or mark the checkbox:
Invalid format for hidden service (simil: Neveljaven naslov skrite storitve (moral bi biti videti kot: http://sestnajst1znakov.onion)
Invalid format for public site (similar: Neveljaven naslov javne strani (moral bi biti videti kot: http://sestnajst1znakov.tor2web.org)
It appears that you are browsing this si: Videti je kot da ne uporabljate ničesar, kar bi zaščitilo komunikacijo in varovalo vašo identiteto!
It appears that you are using Tor. To be: Videti je, kot da uporabljate Tor. Da bi bolje varovali vašo identiteto, poskrbite, da uporabljate Tor Browser.
Just to prove you are human, please answ: Da bi dokazali, da ste človek, rešite slednjo matematično nalogo:
Label: Oznaka
Log in and check it out before it's too: Log in and check it out before it's too late!

Notifications and Files won't be encrypt: Obvestila in datoteke ne bodo šifrirane.
Now type your password, then click 'Log: Zdaj vpišite svoje geslo, nato kliknite "Prijavi":
One or more of the receivers of this tip: One or more of the receivers of this tip has not configured a PGP key.
Please check your key code and try again: Preverite vašo šifro ključa in poizkusite ponovno ali pa pričnite z novo naznanitvijo.
Please choose the primary language of th: Please choose the primary language of the site:
Please configure your PGP keys in the re: Please configure your PGP keys in the receiver preferences page.
Please do not forward or share this emai: Please do not forward or share this email; each tip-off allows a limited number of accesses and downloads before being permanently destroyed and nobody (not even the server administrator) can recover an expired or deleted tip-off.
Please make sure that all related data i: Please make sure that all related data is properly deleted so that the receivers won't be able to further access to it.
Please never disclose these files until: Please never disclose these files until an appropriate analysis, fact checking, journalistic and technical redaction process. For more information about redaction of documents you should consult this page: https://github.com/globaleaks/GlobaLeaks/wiki/Redaction-process.
Please select which language you wish to: Izberite jezik, ki ga želite uporabljati.
Please support Hermes through their dona: Prosimo, da podprete Hermes na naši strani za donacije.
Please take care that all associated dat: Poskrbite, da bodo vsi povezani podatki popolnoma izbrisani.
Public resources can be accessed via Tor: Javno objavljeno je dostopno prek Tor2web
Receivers are very important for a Globa: Receivers are very important for a GlobaLeaks based project. They are the people responsible for receiving the whistleblowers' submissions, verifying their authenticity and for taking action too. Choose them wisely.
Receivers of this Context will be able t: Prejemniki iz tega konteksta bodo lahko brisali naznanitve in njihovo vsebino.
Prejemniki iz tega konteksta bodo lahko odložili datum poteka naznanitve.
Receivers will be able to delete Tips an: Prejemniki bodo lahko brisali naznanitve in njihovo vsebino.
Receivers will be able to postpone Tips: Prejemniki bodo lahko preložili datum izteka prijave.
Remember to provide proper security advi: Ne pozabite poučiti žvižgačev o njihovi varnosti:
Remember your key code for this submissi: Remember your key code for this submission.
Require at least one file to be uploaded: Vsaj ena datoteka mora biti naložena
Resource can only be accessed via the To: Ta vir je dostopen le prek Tor omrežja
Search engine spiders will be allowed to: Pajki iskalnikov bodo lahko iskali po tej aplikaciji.
Send an email notification for every eve: Send an email notification for every event
Server metadata will be now published us: Metapodatki vozlišča bodo zdaj objavljeni v Ahmia JSON zapisu.
Server temporarly unusable due to resour: Vozlišče je trenutno neuporabno zaradi preobremenjenosti; opozorite administratorja, če imate to možnost.
Show small receiver cards on submission: Prikaži majhne kartice prejemnikov v vmesniku za naznanitve
Since GlobaLeaks users are all anonymous: Ker so uporabniki GlobaLeaksa anonimni, ni možno zaznavati anomalij na podlagi spremljanja uporabnikov.
Submission does not pass the field valid: Submission does not pass the field validation
Text shown in front of the context selec: Text shown in front of the context selector
Text shown when the whistleblower is not: Besedilo, ki bo prikazano, če se uporabnik ne povezuje prek Tor omrežja
Text shown when the whistleblower is usi: Besedilo, ki bo prikazano, če se uporabnik povezuje prek Tor omrežja
The Receiver will be able to delete Tips: Prejemnik bo lahko brisal naznanitve in njihovo vsebino.
The Receiver will be able to postpone Ti: Prejemnik bo lahko preložili datum izteka prijave.
The Receiver will be forced to change it: Prejemnik bo prisiljen k menjavi gesla ob naslednji prijavi.
The Tor Browser includes various privacy: Tor Browser vsebuje številne dodatke ter izboljšave, ki ga naredijo varnejšega ter v primerjavi z ostalimi brskalniki bolje varuje vašo identiteto.
The application makes use of Cookies onl: Ta aplikacija uporablja piškotke iz varnostnih razlogov in ne z namenom sledenja.
The choosen password is unsafe, it shoul: Izbrano geslo ni varno, vsebovati mora
The currently adopted policy is to check: Trenutna politika v rabi določa preverjanje, če je bil kateri od pragov dosežen v 30-sekundnem časovnem okvirju.
The file is unavailable due to an intern: Ta datoteka ni dostopna zaradi interne napake.
The file will be available at the URL: /: Datoteka bo dostopna na URL naslovu: /static/$filename
The following represents a description o: The following represents a description of the file collection and its content.
The following step by step wizard will g: The following step by step wizard will guide you through configuring your whistleblowing site.
The included files may contain informati: The included files may contain information that could lead to the identification of the whistleblower and/or that is sensitive for the people and organisations involved.
The key code is either invalid or the su: Šifra ključa je neveljavna ali pa je naznanitvi potekla časovna omejitev.
The proposed PGP key can't be imported: Vnešen PGP ključ ne more biti uvožen
The setting is enabled at a global level: Nastavitev je omogočena na globalni ravni.
The software is developed by the non-pro: To programje smo razvili v nepridobitnem centru Heremes, kjer se ukvarjamo s preglednostjo in človekovimi pravicami v digitalnem svetu.
The specified host does not match any co: Naveden gostitelj se ne ujema z nobenim od nastavljenih.
The submission [%TipNum%] related to con: The submission [%TipNum%] related to context %ContextName% is going to expire in %ExpirationWatch% hours.
The system forces users to change the pa: Sistem prisili uporabnike k menjavi gesla ob prvi prijavi.
The table below shows the files present: Spodnja tabela prikazuje datoteke v imeniku naznanitev in pojasnjuje, kako so povezane z notranjo zbirko podatkov.
The upload request exceeds the size limi: Zahteva za pošiljanje datoteke presega velikostno omejitev
Then, copy and paste the following addre: Potem kopirajte sledeč naslov in ga prilepite v Tor Browser:
There are three types of users in GlobaL: There are three types of users in GlobaLeaks: the administrator, the receiver and the whistleblower. Your username for accessing the server as the administrator will be 'admin'.
These are the thresholds used to identif: Pragovi, ki so uporabljeni za zaznavo neobičajnega vedenja:
They would like you to pay special atten: They would like you to pay special attention to the information and material contained therein. Please keep in mind that whistleblowers often expose themselves to high personal risks for the public interest. Therefore the material that they provide with this tip-off should be considered of high importance.
This email will be used for ping notific: Ta e-pošta bo služila za Ping obvestila.
This happens whenever encryption is unav: To se zgodi, kadar šifriranje ni na voljo.
This interface allows to configure the e: Ta vmesnik omogoča nastavitve e-poštnih predlog za varno obveščanje.
Ta vmesnik omogoča nastavitve e-poštnih predlog za nezaščiteno obveščanje.
This interface may help you spot anomali: Ta vmesnik vam lahko pomaga odkriti nepravilnosti na vašem vozlišču.
This interface may help you understand h: S tega vmesnika lahko pridobite informacije, kako nastaviti svoje vozlišče ter kje lahko poiščete preostale uporabnike GlobaLeaksa in eksperte.
S tega vmesnika lahko pridobite informacije o žvižgačevi rabi vozlišča. Ta prikazuje, koliko je trenutnih naznanitev ter še nekaj druge statistike (aktivnosti, datoteke, komentarji).
This interface shows user activity on yo: Ta vmesnik prikazuje aktivnosti uporabnikov vašega vozlišča. To je lahko uporabno pri odkrivanju anomalij in zagotavljanju podpore prejemnikom.
This interface shows you the unusual beh: Ta vmesnik prikazuje neobičajno vedenje in dogodke, ki jih je sistem zaznal.
This is a work-in-progress of the admini: Kar boste videli po prijavi kot administrator, je vmesnik v nastajanju.
This is an email to inform you that the: This is an email to inform you that the PGP key of the following users is going to expire or has already expired:
This is an email to inform you that your: This is an email to inform you that your PGP key is expiring or has already expired.
This is an email to notify you about a n: This is an email to notify you about a new message from the whisleblower.
This is an email to notify you that %Com: This is an email to notify you that %CommentSource% has commented on a previous submission.
This is an email to notify you that a wh: This is an email to notify you that a whistleblower has selected you as a valuable recipient for his/her submission.
This is an email to notify you that a whistleblower has updated a submission with new material.
This may lead to unintended access to th: This may lead to unintended access to the files by the server administrator or others in case the server is compromised.
This means that if the server running Gl: To pomeni, da če bo strežnik GlobaLeaksa zasežen, bo z njega moč pridobiti datoteke, ki so bile predane ob naznanitvi.
This means that the submitted files will: This means that the submitted files will be stored in plaintext on the server.
This platform makes use of GlobaLeaks so: GlobaLeaks je bil posebej zasnovan, da zavaruje identiteto tako pošiljatelja kot prejemnika ob izmenjavi naznanila s priloženim gradivom.
Ta prejemnik ne more biti odstranjen.
Ta prejemnik ne more biti izbran.
This receiver has configured the encrypt: Ta prejemnik je nastavil svoj šifrirni ključ.
This receiver has not configured the enc: Ta prejemnik še ni nastavil svojega šifrirnega ključa.
This won't preserve Whistleblower's anon: Na ta način žvižgačeva anonimnost ni zagotovljena, je pa zagotovljena tajnost naznanitve.
Tip [%TipNum%] is going to expire in %Ex: Tip [%TipNum%] is going to expire in %ExpirationWatch% hours
To ensure your anonymity you must use th:
To ensure your anonymity you must use the Tor Browser to visit this site.
You acknowledge that failure to do so will result in the inability to technically protect your anonymity.
To further enhance your security, please follow these instructions:
1) In the event that you would like to remain anonymous, do not submit any personal information. (e.g. your name or relationship to the offender. Do not submit any information that can be traced back to you.)
2) Please do not submit your report on a PC provided by your employer. Particularly an intranet connection may jeopardize your anonymity.
To know more about GlobaLeaks Security y: Če si želite izvedeti več o varnosti GlobaLeaksa, vam ponujamo v branje sledeč dokument:
To properly organize your project, pleas: Da bi bolje organizirali svoj projekt, prosimo, da preberete spodnja priporočila:
To report a bug or request a feature in: Hrošče, ki ste jih našli ali želje po novih funkcionalnostih GlobaLeaksa nam lahko sporočite, tako da odprete zahtevek in opišete težave, na katere ste naleteli ali razložite svojo zamisel:
To use GlobaLeaks Cookies must be enable: Za uporabo GlobaLeaksa morate omogočiti piškotke.
Use the 16 digit key code to log in. It: Use the 16 digit key code to log in. It will allow you to view any messages we sent you, and also to add extra info.
We do not discriminate based on race and: Ne zanimajo nas vaša barva kože, narodnost, spol ... Diskriminacijo izvajamo zgolj nad računalniki, da bi onemogočili avtomatizirano interakcijo in z njo povezane nevšečnosti. :)
We will try to get back to you as soon a: We will try to get back to you as soon as possible!
What is the topic of your whistleblowing: What is the topic of your whistleblowing project?
When the option is re-enabled the spoole: Ko je možnost ponovno omogočena, bo e-pošta, ki je v čakanju, odposlana.
Which of the following statements is tru: Katera od navedenih trditev je pravilna?
With a HTTPS submission you are exposing:
With a HTTPS submission you are exposing yourself to the risks that someone else will know that you have submitted something, without knowing what you have submitted.

Instead with an Anonymous Submission you are fully protected, it is not possible for a third party to know that you have submitted something nor what you have submitted.

We strongly advise you to go for an Anonymous Submission.

To make an Anonymous Submission, instead of using your usual Web Browser (Internet Explorer, Chrome, Firefox, Opera, etc.) you should use the Tor Browser. This is a special piece of software designed to enable Anonymous Web Browsing.
Without a valid PGP key, the system will: Without a valid PGP key, the system will not be able to send encrypted notifications to you.
Without a valid PGP key, the system will not be able to send them encrypted notifications.
You are aware of the risks involved. Go: You are aware of the risks involved. Go ahead, but consider yourself warned.
You are connecting to the server without: Z vozliščem se povezujete neanonimno, toda to vozlišče podpira zgolj anonimne naznanitve.
You are strongly advised to visit this s: resno priporočamo, da stran obiščete prek Tor omrežja z uporabo Tor Browserja in tako zaščitite svojo identiteto.
You can reach GlobaLeaks's support chat: Podpora za GlobaLeaks je dosegljiva prek IRC klepeta na kanalu #globaleaks OFTC strežnika.
You have finished configuring your Globa: You have finished configuring your GlobaLeaks site. You are now ready to further tweak it with the admin interface.
You have not configured your encryption: You have not configured your encryption keys, so the files will be stored on the GlobaLeaks server un-encrypted.
You now have %EventCount% good reasons t: You now have %EventCount% good reasons to reconnect where is matters
You should extend its validity and updat: You should extend its validity and update the key present on the GlobaLeaks servers you are subscribed to or upload a new key.
Tekom te ure je bilo vozlišče ugasnjeno.
has postponed Tip expiration to: je odložil datum poteka naznanitve na
